Name: 学院逃生
About the game: This is a pixel RPG game with multi-threaded plot, in which the protagonist (Shi Yafan) and his three dormitories are finally ready to escape from the college in a year of limited freedom; You have to find the materials left by your classmates in the last seven days to help yourself and your roommates escape and finally find the way home. This game is the fourth one I've made, and the only one I can win (a small part is based on 'the collapse of Yangcun'). Because I really don't know how to release the game, so I sent the free game here (about 650 yuan more). This game is a free game, so it's not a commercial work, and there won't be an indescribable infringement dispute (probably). All of this game is purely entertainment, do not go online!!!!!! Well, that's all. I hope you like it. Thank you. (✿◠‿◠)(✿◠‿◠)(✿◠‿◠)
